name: 2025 6th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence in Electronics Engineering
content: Publication: Accepted and properly registered papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM with ISBN 979-8-4007-0707-0, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
